title: ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Research Associate Post
description: Acharya NG Ranga Agricultural University (ANGRAU) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post Graduation, PhD, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the ANGRAU Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
